Record_string._before-string-or-null--af.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

hasChildren.description: This is always set when asTree=true

nestedChildrenCount.description: The total nested child count included in this response (may be more available w/ pagination) Only set with asTree=true, otherwise this will be null.

childCount.description: You must ask the API to count children (with asTree=true&countChildren=true), otherwise this will be null. This will be the complete direct child count, whereas children may only contain a subset based on pagination.

commentIds.description: A list of comment ids to check if are blocked after performing the update.

AggregationResponse.description: The API response returns the aggregated data along with simple stats

AggregationOperation.description: An operation that will be applied on a field

alias.description: Optional alias for the output; if not provided, a default alias is computed

AggregationRequest.description: The aggregation request accepts a resource, optional grouping keys, an array of operations, and an optional sort

post.description: Enable or disable notifications for a specific comment.

Enable or disable notifications for a page. When users are subscribed to a page, notifications are created
for new root comments, and also

parameters.description: Size preset: "Default" (1000x1000px) or "CrossPlatform" (creates sizes for popular devices)
parameters.name: sizePreset

parameters.description: Page id that upload is happening from, to configure
parameters.name: urlId

parameters.description: A comma separated list of comment ids.
parameters.name: commentIds

post.description:
Aggregates documents by grouping them (if groupBy is provided) and applying multiple operations.
Different operations (e.g. sum, countDistinct, avg, etc.) are supported.
